I've worn it a few times now and I'm happy that there hasn't been any ripping or tearing on the faux-leaher and/or of the seams holding it together, and most importantly, all of the pyramid studs were in tact. My only real complaint with the belt is that the studs abruptly stop halfway up the belt. So from the front, it would appear as if it's just a plain belt. It's still super cute, and I am so glad I was able to snag one of these while they were still available. It's comfortable, bends with my body and accentuates all of my outfits with ease. Love it!

类型: Color: Black GrommetSize: M Fit Pant below 39'' （Length 43'')
评论详情: The belt feels well-made for the most part. I like the metal grommets around the buckling holes, because those holes eventually stretch and wear out on all my other belts. That's a nice touch. Additionally, I like that the studs are anchored in more than just two points each. They will hold up to long-term abuse for sure.  I like that it's all black, too. A little more subtle than silver studs on black (or any other combination).  If I have one complaint, I suppose the actual belt material feels just a *tad* on the cheaper side. It's not a huge complaint though, and for this price point I'm certainly not expecting real leather or anything.  Overall I'm definitely happy.

I love these belts. I've never had belts that tighten/loosen the way that these do, which is kind of similar to how you tighten the straps on a bra, but I love it because they always stay very snug with just the right amount of give to remain a perfect fit all day. While these belts are super cute, the clasps are very delicate and often slip open. It's a bit difficult to adjust as there isn't really anything that holds the size in place. They are a great fashion option but aren't super functional as actual belts.

This belt definitely wins. I is sturdy, has all the shiny metal bits, and it holds up my pants / skirt / kilt / or what ever else I decide to wear.  It is very true to size so keep that in mind. If your waist gets too small you'll have to pop off the diamonds and then punch a hole it in to keep wearing it, or just pass it on to someone else who will wear it, because again it looks great and they will probably love it too.

评论概述: Just ok, sort of cheap and don't stay well
评论详情: These belts are fine. I think they will work best as waist belts rather than a belt you are relying on to keep your pants up! They are adjustable and they will stretch out when pushed/pulled from sitting or standing in them. They stay decently well but the extra pressure causes them to open.  The buckles don't close flush so they look a little cheap. I get WHY it is that way but rather than have the buckle open in the middle, it would make more sense to have them open on the end of the buckle so it doesn't look so cheap.  Overall, these are fine. They are not what I had hoped for and like I said, I will probably use them more as waist belts than belts to keep my pants up!

Really like the four colors and the ability to adjust the sizing. The only con about these is I am not sure how long the closures are going to last. The closures are not of the best quality metal and the hooks might break with too much pressure. Also note, the hooks don't have a huge hook in them so when you breathe in too much and your waist shrinks it might come unhooked. That has happened a few times already. Not too big of a deal if you have belt loops but most the dresses I wear them with do not have loops. Might need to macgyver something to keep them together a bit better. Cost for quality is to be expected. Leather is nicer than expected.

These are really good quality belts.  I love the design of these belts.  They have an adjustable strap that lets them fold to a shorter length.  That makes it easy to adjust for waist and  also for storage! It’s really a good idea for a belt!  The buckles fasten well and stay fastened.  I love all four colors.  They are very versatile and look good with so many colors in my wardrobe!

The RUILAIBO 4 Pack Adjustable No-Hole Skinny Waist Belt for Women Set is Fantastic!!!  I’m super happy with these belts! They’re so easy to use and you can adjust them for wearing with pants or dresses and skirts. They feel comfortable and have well done stitching.  I really like the 4 colors that the set includes, neutral colors that you can combine with any of your clothing pieces.  These belts come in a nice box that you can use for gifting or to store your belts.  I love the style, the width and the buckles.  I definitely recommend getting these belt set.
She liked the ability to mix and match the colors (and even wear more than one) with what she's wearing.

Overall I did like these belts and I love that they came in different colors. They’re easy to adjust to the size you need and very easy to store. My only issue is the construction feels roughly done if that makes sense. They don’t feel as delicate as they should be for a thin women’s belt.

Off the bat, I -LOVE- a belt accent and find myself switching from the elastic wides to the mediums and slims these days.  For a moment, I actually wasn’t expecting these to fit — basing them on a two set I got previously and the 35” ceiling.  But nope, PERFECT!! The colors of closures are neither here nor there for me; they’re a great accent, cinch well without being too thick, come in a nice assortment of belt colors and the adjustment is VERY easy.  Awesome accessory at an awesome price point!! 👌🏾

Has quite a bit of shine to the leather that makes it appear to be plastic. Studs have a great style but not a high quality material. Good value for an affordable option for teens to get the look they want

I love how these belts are constructed with the ability to adjust the size to exactly your waist size. It’s similar to how a string bracelet has two knots in the middle so that you just have to pull on the knots to tighten. This type of design is genius for belts and you will get the perfect fit. The quality of the buckle and the belt itself is also really good.

These belts not only provide a great fit but also come in a trendy box-packaging, making it a perfect gift for yourself or someone special.  The belts are elegant and chic, thanks to the decorative gold buckle that adds a fashionable touch to any outfit. The quality of the belts is impressive, and the adjustable feature with a no-hole and free adjust system ensures a perfect fit for various outfits, whether casual or formal. The size range of 23-35 inches provides flexibility for different waist sizes.  What I appreciate most about these belts is their versatility. They suit women of all age groups and effortlessly complement a wide range of outfits, including blouses, sweaters, and coats. Whether it's for daily wear or business attire, these belts are comfortable and convenient.  Furthermore, the customer service provided by RUILAIBO is outstanding. They offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, ensuring customer satisfaction. The belts were carefully reviewed before delivery, which reflects their commitment to quality.

I love skinny waist belts, especially when you wear it with a dress. My waist is 30 inches and it was true to size. I'm happy with the colors that it comes in however I'm not a fan of the antique-gold metal buckle, It is not my style. I don't think it looks chic enough however these go with anything, pants, dresses, skirts etc: The price is also great!.  *Thanks for reading my review. I hope it helps make your decision easier

I got this belt set for my daughter - waist 28 inches. The belts are reasonably well made and the color selection is great. The antique-gold metal buckle looks nice. The belt doesn't have holes, the length is adjusted by pushing the back ends of the belt together. Nice accessories for pants and dresses. Good value for the price.

My girlfriend loves these belts!  She was wearing one out last night when we went to dinner.  They can really upgrade the look of a dress.  She loves that she has the different colors to mix and match.Recommended...

I am in love with these belts. They look great with so many things. They fit well and are easy to adjust. I have a 30 “ waist and there is plenty of room to go much bigger. The buckles stay buckled while wearing.

We just received the RUILAIBO Skinny Waist Belt pack that I ordered for my wife, and the first impression was quite favorable. The pack arrived with four belts, each presenting a unique design that immediately caught our attention.  The belts' no-hole adjustable feature promises a perfect fit for a variety of outfits, a plus point that my wife appreciated instantly. On the surface, these belts seem like they would add a touch of sophistication and style to both casual and formal attire.  However, upon closer inspection, we noticed that while the belts are certainly stylish, the material doesn't come across as premium. This observation led us to believe that there could be some improvement in the quality department.  That said, we're looking forward to seeing how these belts perform in everyday use and how they stand the test of time.

First of all, getting four in a pack is an awesome deal! I love the color varieties available. It is easily adjusted to fit your waist. The adjustable area is also tight so it doesn’t come loose easily. The only flaw I saw was that the red belt had one prong that was shorter than the other. After wearing the belt for 24 hours though, I did not have any issues with it coming undone. It stayed put and stayed snug. And the buckle design is cute too! Definitely get the set.

These extend up to 35". My wife is 27" in waist and 34" in hips and these fit perfectly. She really likes them. They come in a nice box. You get 4 belts in different colors. She likes the simple, but elegant buckle design. It can go with pretty much any outfit. These belts don't have holes, but you put them on and adjust them on the back in a super easy way. So if you're looking for a belt to hold your pants in place this isn't it. This is more of an accessory. Since they don't have holes the belt will not be bending and breaking and you don't need to be making extra holes in order to find your perfect fit.

评论概述: Need to be part of your wardrobe
评论详情: These belts are a nice staple to your wardrobe. They arrived in a good quality box that you can continue to store the belts. Coming in four colors it is sure to match many things in your closet. It can be worn with dresses and even jeans. I love the adjustable feature of the belts without the extra strap to try to hide or tuck. I wore it with a dress for 7 hours and it stayed in place without the belt coming loose. I love the buckles. They have somewhat of an aged gold/vintage look to them. Would definitely recommend these nice, good quality belts.

I absolutely adore these belts. They are easy to wear and compliment any outfit for a party, work, or everyday wear. The various colors are lovely and go with any outfit. I intend to highly enjoy these belts for as long as I can. I encourage everyone who is looking for a stylish way to accentuate their waist to invest in this belt set!

评论概述: These are just OK in my opinion, look kind of cheap in real life
评论详情: I really like the concept of these beltS but they just look fake leather and the clasps are really cheap looking. I might try to spray paint them black by taping off the fake leather part. The "gold" tone is really brassy and garish in my opinion. I’m just not a fan I would rather have spent more for better quality.

This belt set ROCKS!!! Better quality than what the local stores have, but I’d say still not HotTopic quality. Belt is adjustable of course, easy to wear, and makes a bold statement. The studded bracelets my daughter loves the MOST! she said they are comfortable and people ask her often where she bought the, from. The whole set is great, and I ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Good quality.  Easy to wear.  Fun size options on the bracelets.  Comfortable and fits great.  Good for everyday wear or even for a costume.  Would make a nice gift.

评论概述: Fun heavy-metal belt and wrist bands from 80's
评论详情: These are a great costume quality belt and wrist bands. Great for Halloween rock and roll outfit. Belt fits 37 to 43 inches. Wristbands barely fit my 7 inch around wrist. You get three wristbands , a single, double and triple row studs. Belt is thick, flexible and feels and smells like real leather even though it is polyurethane. Comes in a nice presentation box. Would be a great gift for your punk rocker.

评论概述: sturdy, stylish, and a good value for the price
评论详情: This belt and bracelet set was pleasantly sturdy. I am going to a rock concert so I wanted more punk pieces and this set does the job for a low price. I'm slim but the belt isn't too long for me and the bracelets fit well I wish two matched rather than all three being different widths, but they do the job and are comfortable to wear.

评论概述: Well made, look great, very nostalgic
评论详情: This studded cuffs and belt set is really great. I got it for a costume and it’s perfect for my outfit. They are well made and won’t fall apart when you wear them. The fit very nicely on my wrists, I can even go down to the smaller size. The belt fit perfectly. They did have a smell when I opened them, but it went away quickly. The look really great on. I recommend this product.
Good set
Great fit for my outfits, really good value for this kind of style.

评论概述: Taking me back down memory lane
评论详情: I couldn't resist this belt primarily because I always wanted one when I was a teenager and my parents wouldn't get one for me. Aside from that, I really tend to wear a lot of black and white outfits and I think this is absolutely a great accessory for that aesthetic.  The belt is well-crafted and sturdy and true to size. The bracelets are a nice bonus, overall this is a good set to own.

I am so in love. Not only does the belt fit perfectly, but the bracelets do also. I felt a bit empowered wearing them. There is something about studs. I normally do not tuck my shirts in. I have some really cute belts that no one has ever seen. Not with this belt, I was tucking all my shirts in. I want to show off my "On edge" persona. This is the belt I wear most often since I received it.
I love this set! It comes with the belt and 4 different cuffs of different widths. Awesome quality function and design.
